video_prompt: The figure's luminous golden eyes pulsate with energy. Subtle gold forehead markings gently shimmer. Shimmering golden and blue light particles drift across their skin and attire. Red ribbons subtly sway. In the dark background, twinkling golden and blue lights appear and vanish, creating a dynamic, mystical atmosphere around a slowly appearing and disappearing cross-shaped star.
image_prompt: **Prompt:** Vertical portrait of a regal, powerful elf deity with ethereal pale skin, long flowing silver hair, and intense glowing golden-yellow eyes. Adorned in elaborate, ornate gold armor with dragon/leaf/swirling patterns. Gold markings on forehead and around eyes. Serene, solemn expression. Dark, cosmic background with twinkling golden and blue lights, bokeh, and a cross-shaped star. Subtle red ribbons/fabric. Cosmic dust/magical essence shimmering on skin and clothing. Highly detailed, realistic yet fantastical digital art. Dark, mysterious, powerful, ancient, ethereal beauty.
refined_video_prompt: Golden eyes pulsate with energy. Forehead markings gently shimmer. Golden and blue light particles drift across skin and attire. Red ribbons subtly sway. In the dark background, twinkling golden and blue lights dynamically appear and vanish. A cross-shaped star slowly appears, then fades away.
